document.full_text: freddie roach believes that floyd mayweather jr. could be preparing for a long-awaited showdown with manny pacquiao by returning to the ring in september.
document.title: roach: mayweather could be prepping for pacquiao
lines_and_colors: freddie roach believes that floyd mayweather jr. could be preparing for a long-awaited showdown with manny pacquiao by returning to the ring in september.
